Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config.LegacyNumericConfig
    Index with Points instead and use PointsConfig
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config.LegacyNumericFieldConfigListener
    Index with Points instead and use PointsConfigListener
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.nodes.LegacyNumericQueryNode
    Index with Points instead and use PointQueryNode instead.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.processors.LegacyNumericQueryNodeProcessor
    Index with points and use PointQueryNodeProcessor instead.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders.LegacyNumericRangeQueryBuilder
    Index with points and use PointRangeQueryBuilder instead
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.nodes.LegacyNumericRangeQueryNode
    Index with Points instead and use PointRangeQueryNode instead.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.builders.LegacyNumericRangeQueryNodeBuilder
    Index with points and use PointRangeQueryNodeBuilder instead.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.processors.LegacyNumericRangeQueryNodeProcessor
    Index with points and use PointRangeQueryNodeProcessor instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config.StandardQueryConfigHandler.ConfigurationKeys.LEGACY_NUMERIC_CONFIG
    Index with Points instead and use StandardQueryConfigHandler.ConfigurationKeys.POINTS_CONFIG
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.config.StandardQueryConfigHandler.ConfigurationKeys.LEGACY_NUMERIC_CONFIG_MAP
    Index with Points instead and use StandardQueryConfigHandler.ConfigurationKeys.POINTS_CONFIG_MAP
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.query.SimpleTerm.compareTo(SimpleTerm)
    (March 2011) Not normally used, to be removed from Lucene 4.0. This class implementing Comparable is to be removed at the same time.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.CharStream.getColumn()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.parser.CharStream.getColumn()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser.CharStream.getColumn()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.StandardQueryParser.getLegacyNumericConfigMap()
    Index with points instead and use StandardQueryParser.getPointsConfigMap()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.CharStream.getLine()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.parser.CharStream.getLine()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.surround.parser.CharStream.getLine()
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.StandardQueryParser.setLegacyNumericConfigMap(Map<String, LegacyNumericConfig>)
    Index with points instead and use StandardQueryParser.setPointsConfigMap(Map)
